title: [NGMobile][Options] Identification and Delivery of Included/Discounted Tariff Options
description:
Description
Description: Develop a solution to identify and deliver all bookable options for a specific selected tariff, focusing on distinguishing between included options (priced at 0€) and discounted options. This requires comparing prices from the Nepal system and the Carmen list to identify discrepancies due to varying contexts. The solution will ensure that customers receive accurate information about available tariff options, highlighting any special pricing or included benefits.
Acceptance Criteria:
Accurately identify and list all bookable options for the selected tariff.
Only display options that are not included (0€) but could be discounted.
Verify option pricing against Nepal and Carmen systems to account for context-specific variations.
